properties.name: Primary Melee Weapon
properties.message: Primary Melee Weapon {primary_name} To Hit: {1d20 + primary_bonus+strength+attack_bonus}, Damage: {1d@:primary_damage:+primary_bonus+strength}

properties.name: dexterity
properties.message: dexterity check: {turned_roll=1d20} + {dexterity} >= {if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}: {turned_roll + dexterity >= if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}

properties.name: intelligence
properties.message: intelligence check: {turned_roll=1d20} + {intelligence} >= {if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}: {turned_roll + intelligence >= if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}

properties.name: wisdom
properties.message: wisdom check: {turned_roll=1d20} + {wisdom} >= {if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}: {turned_roll + wisdom >= if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}

properties.name: charisma
properties.message: charisma check: {turned_roll=1d20} + {charisma} >= {if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}: {turned_roll + charisma >= if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}

properties.name: strength
properties.message: strength check: {turned_roll=1d20} + {strength} >= {if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}: {turned_roll + strength >= if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}

properties.name: Primary Bow Weapon
properties.message: Primary Bow Weapon {primary_name} To Hit: {1d20 + primary_bonus+dexterity+attack_bonus}, Damage: {1d@:primary_damage:+primary_bonus}

properties.name: Primary Thrown Weapon
properties.message: Primary Thrown Weapon {primary_name} To Hit: {1d20 + primary_bonus+dexterity+attack_bonus}, Damage: {1d@:primary_damage:+primary_bonus+strength}

properties.name: Secondary Melee Weapon
properties.message: Secondary Melee Weapon {secondary_name} To Hit: {1d20 + secondary_bonus+strength+attack_bonus}, Damage: {1d@:secondary_damage:+secondary_bonus+strength}

properties.name: Secondary Bow Weapon
properties.message: Secondary Bow Weapon {secondary_name} To Hit: {1d20 + secondary_bonus+dexterity+attack_bonus}, Damage: {1d@:secondary_damage:+secondary_bonus}

properties.name: Secondary Thrown Weapon
properties.message: Secondary Thrown Weapon {secondary_name} To Hit: {1d20 + secondary_bonus+dexterity+attack_bonus}, Damage: {1d@:secondary_damage:+secondary_bonus+strength}

properties.name: Initiative
properties.message: !r initiative = 1d6

properties.name: constitution
properties.message: constitution check: {turned_roll=1d20} + {constitution} >= {if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}: {turned_roll + constitution >= if(level<=20,round(-0.5*level+17.2381),7)}

properties.name: Dragon Breath
properties.message: Dragon Breath Saving Throw: {1d20 >= dragon_breath}

properties.name: Rod Staff or Spell
properties.message: Rod Staff or Spell Saving Throw: {1d20 >= rod_staff_or_spell}

properties.name: Find Secret Doors
properties.message: Roll for Finding Secret Doors: {1d6 <= find_secret_doors}

properties.name: Dwarf Detection
properties.message: Roll for Dwarf Detection: {1d6 <= dwarf_detection}

properties.name: Racial Restrictions
properties.formula: if(indexOf("Dwarf",Race)==0,"Class may not be Magic-User; Minimum Constitution 9; Maximum Charisma 17; May not employ weapons longer than 4 feet",if(indexOf("Elf",Race)==0,"Minimum Intelligence 9; Maximum Constitution 17; Never roll larger than a 6-sided die for hit points.",if(indexOf("Halfling",Race)==0,"Class may not be Magic-User; Minimum Dexterity 9; Maximum Strength 17; Never roll larger than a 6-sided die for hit points; May not use Large weapons; Must wield Medium weapons with both hands",if(indexOf("Human",Race)==0,"None","see Rules"))))

properties.name: Race Paralysis or Turn to Stone
open-locks
properties.message: Open Locks: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= open-locks}

properties.name: find-traps
properties.message: Find Traps: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= find-traps}

properties.name: remove-traps
properties.message: Remove Traps: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= remove-traps}

properties.name: pick-pockets
properties.message: Pick Pockets: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= pick-pockets}

properties.name: move-silently
properties.message: Move Silently: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= move-silently}

properties.name: climb-walls
properties.message: Climb Walls: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= climb-walls}

properties.name: hide-in-shadows
properties.message: Hide: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= hide-in-shadows}

properties.name: hear-noise
properties.message: Listen: {1d100 + dm_task_modifier <= hear-noise}

properties.name: turn-zombie
properties.message: Turn Zombie/2 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-zombie} ? {turned_roll>=turn-zombie}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-zombie==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-zombie==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-zombie>0 and turn-zombie<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-zombie<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: turn-skeleton
properties.message: Turn Skeleton/1 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-skeleton} ? {turned_roll>=turn-skeleton}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-skeleton==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-skeleton==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-skeleton>0 and turn-skeleton<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-skeleton<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: Magic Wands
properties.message: Magic Wands Saving Throw: {1d20 >= magic_wands}

properties.name: turn-ghoul
properties.message: Turn Ghoul/3 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-ghoul} ? {turned_roll>=turn-ghoul}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-ghoul==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-ghoul==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-ghoul>0 and turn-ghoul<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-ghoul<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: turn-wight
properties.message: Turn Wight/4 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-wight} ? {turned_roll>=turn-wight}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-wight==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-wight==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-wight>0 and turn-wight<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-wight<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.message: Turn Wraith/5 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-wraith} ? {turned_roll>=turn-wraith}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-wraith==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-wraith==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-wraith>0 and turn-wraith<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-wraith<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: turn-mummy
properties.message: Turn Mummy/6 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-mummy} ? {turned_roll>=turn-mummy}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-mummy==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-mummy==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-mummy>0 and turn-mummy<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-mummy<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: turn-ghost
properties.message: Turn Ghost/9+ HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-ghost} ? {turned_roll>=turn-ghost}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-ghost==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-ghost==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-ghost>0 and turn-ghost<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-ghost<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: turn-spectre
properties.message: Turn Spectre/7 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-spectre} ? {turned_roll>=turn-spectre}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-spectre==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-spectre==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-spectre>0 and turn-spectre<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-spectre<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: BFRPG Character Template by Brucifer - version
Paralysis or Turn to Stone
properties.message: Paralysis or Turn to Stone Saving Throw: {1d20 >= paralysis_or_turn_to_stone}

properties.name: Racial Special Abilities
properties.formula: if(indexOf("Dwarf",Race)==0,"Dwarf Detection: able to detect slanting passages, traps, shifting walls and new construction on a roll of 1-2 on 1d6, a search must be performed before this roll may be made.",if(indexOf("Elf",Race)==0,"Has 1 in a 6-sided die chance to find secret doors with a cursory look; Immune to paralyzing attack of ghouls; Less likely to be surprised, reducing the chance by 1 in a 6-sided die chance",if(indexOf("Halfling",Race)==0,"Gains +1 Attack Bonus with ranged weapons; +2 AC when attacked in melee by creatures larger than man-sized; +1 to Initiative; Hide Outdoors 90% Success; Hide Indoors 70% Success",if(indexOf("Human",Race)==0,"Gain +10% bonus to XP","see Rules"))))

properties.name: turn-vampire
properties.message: Turn Vampire/8 HD Undead: {turned_roll = 1d20} >= {turn-vampire} ? {turned_roll>=turn-vampire}, HD Damaged: {if(turn-vampire==0,sum(2d6),0)} for {if(turn-vampire==0,sum(@:level:d8),0)} HP each, HD Turned: {if(turn-vampire>0 and turn-vampire<99,sum(2d6),0)}, for {if(turn-vampire<99,sum(2d4),0)} turns

properties.name: Death Ray or Poison
properties.message: Death Ray or Poison Saving Throw: {1d20 >= death_ray_or_poison}
